main event: Witnesses reported observing a UFO with flashing red, green, and white lights in Wichita Falls, Texas on 31 March 1966.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately one hour while it moved in a westward direction after circling overhead,Observers described hearing a hissing sound similar to a jet engine during the sighting,One witness mentioned that the object had a shimmering appearance and appeared very large,The object emitted lights that would fade and brighten,Military personnel, including Sgt. Robert J. Ray and Sgt. William H. Neville, were also witnesses and reported similar observations.
witness description: A civilian and two military sergeants
